EmailTemplate.subject: Webcast: Data’s Potential to Power Innovation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/hadoop/customer-case-study/pivotal-hadoop-and-aridhia-revolutionize-healthcare> Join us <http://connect.pivotal.io/APJ_Webinar_Aridhia-Replay-Campaign_Q414_Registration.html?src=APJ_Webinar_Aridhia-WebinarReplay_Webcast-Campaign_Q414> for our webinar – Data’s Potential to Power Innovation
The power of data is often discussed, but here's a real life example of the value it can provide. Regardless of the industry in which you operate, Aridhia's insights will provide you some key takeaways.
Register <http://connect.pivotal.io/APJ_Webinar_Aridhia-Replay-Campaign_Q414_Registration.html?src=APJ_Webinar_Aridhia-WebinarReplay_Webcast-Campaign_Q414> now to learn how Aridhia is:
- Maximizing the potential of existing data within the healthcare system. - Enabling healthcare providers to inform clinical outcomes from insights gained from complex datasets. - Delivering care locally through sharing of information between healthcare providers and organizations. - Providing a data science safe haven that promotes collaboration between healthcare, academia and industry.
We look forward to you joining us.
